Text: The Rawtenstall to Bacup railway line opened in two stages, from Rawtenstall to Waterfoot in 1848, and from Waterfoot to the Bacup terminus in 1852.

Text: Rawtenstall to Bacup Line:  Passenger and freight services operated until the Beeching cuts in 1966, the last passenger train running on December 5th 1966 and the track being lifted in 1969.
